Name: Smooth Mover
About the game: In Smooth Mover you will be challenged to move smoothly through a series of 40 carefully designed, rage-inducing levels. Avoid spikes, enemies, and lasers as you navigate each level as quickly as possible in order to achieve the fastest time on the leaderboards.
